POST /v4/reports:batchGet HTTP/1.1
Host: analyticsreporting.googleapis.com
Content-Type: application/json

{"reportRequests":[{"viewId":"1","dateRanges":[{"endDate":"today","startDate":"today"}],"dimensions":[{"name":"ga:pagePath"}],"metrics":[{"expression":"ga:uniquePageviews"}],"filtersExpression":"ga:pagePath=~^/news/\\d\\d\\d\\d","orderBys":[{"fieldName":"ga:uniquePageviews","sortOrder":"DESCENDING"}],"pageSize":20,"pageToken":""}]}
